swarm.value: {"summary": "Designed optimized multi-tier database architecture with PostgreSQL clustering, TimescaleDB for metrics, Redis L1 cache, Memcached L2 cache, sharding strategy, and comprehensive migration plan", "key_decisions": ["Multi-tier caching with Redis and Memcached", "TimescaleDB for time-series data", "PostgreSQL partitioning by date", "Horizontal sharding by tenant", "Materialized views for reporting", "8-week phased migration with zero downtime"], "performance_targets": {"query_latency": "10ms for cached, 100ms for DB", "throughput": "100,000 QPS", "availability": "99.99%", "storage": "10TB with compression"}, "files_created": ["docs/database-architecture-design.md", "database/schemas/optimized_schema.sql", "src/cache/caching-strategy.ts", "docs/database-migration-plan.md"]}
